title: Want to sell ACC how much is it worth
body:
i have a GOLD 5 account and it only needs 6 champs left to buy, I almost have 2 skins for all my champs, I can't play anymore as my kids 1 and needs a lot more attention and I wanna pass on my acc, I just don't know how much it's worth, can someone please help?? 

GOLD 5 6 champs left to buy... Approx 2 skins to each champ

replies.body: not sure if trolling or not but if not, i guess you don't realise it's against their tos to buy/sell accounts. so posting on official riot boards about it is not a good idea.
